name: Bright Minds Learning Center
shortDescription: Expert support for students with dyslexia.
longDescription: Bright Minds offers specialized programs tailored to help children overcome reading challenges. Our trained staff uses evidence-based strategies to boost literacy skills.

name: Focus Forward Academy
shortDescription: Empowering students with ADHD to thrive.
longDescription: Focus Forward Academy provides coaching and workshops to help students manage attention and behavior. Our team includes certified ADHD coaches and educational therapists.

name: The Learning Bridge
shortDescription: Personalized learning plans for children with ASD.
longDescription: The Learning Bridge is committed to inclusive education. We use structured teaching, sensory integration, and visual supports to guide every child on their unique path.

name: Smart Steps Tutoring
shortDescription: Helping students with mild learning challenges.
longDescription: Smart Steps provides 1-on-1 tutoring and academic support for students with difficulties in reading, writing, or math. We partner with parents and schools for success.

name: Calm Minds Education
longDescription: Calm Minds offers therapeutic interventions and coping strategies for students experiencing anxiety, test pressure, and emotional distress related to academics.

name: ReadWell Centre
shortDescription: Building strong readers with proven techniques.
longDescription: At ReadWell, we focus on phonics, vocabulary, and reading fluency. Our instructors use engaging methods that develop confident, independent readers.

name: NeuroNurture
longDescription: NeuroNurture specializes in supporting children with varied neurodevelopmental profiles through customized learning plans and occupational therapy support.
